trans-unit.source: Identifies the version of the .NET Framework that a particular assembly was compiled against.
trans-unit.target: 标识编译特定程序集时所针对的 .NET Framework 的版本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.TargetFrameworkAttribute> class provides an attribute that you can apply to an assembly to indicate the version of the .NET Framework runtime against which the assembly was built.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.TargetFrameworkAttribute>类提供的特性可应用于程序集可指示针对其生成的程序集的.NET Framework 运行时版本。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following example applies the `TargetFrameworkAttribute` to an assembly to indicate that it was built using [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 例如，下面的示例适用`TargetFrameworkAttribute`的程序集以指示它构建使用[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.TargetFrameworkAttribute> class constructor has a single parameter, `frameworkName`, that specifies the .NET Framework version against which the assembly was built.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.TargetFrameworkAttribute>类构造函数具有单个参数， `frameworkName`，，它指定针对其生成的程序集的.NET Framework 版本。

trans-unit.source: This parameter maps to the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.TargetFrameworkAttribute.FrameworkName%2A> property.

In addition, the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.TargetFrameworkAttribute> attribute can specify a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.TargetFrameworkAttribute.FrameworkDisplayName%2A> property to provide a more descriptive .NET Framework version string that is suitable for displaying to clients of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.TargetFrameworkAttribute>特性可以指定<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.TargetFrameworkAttribute.FrameworkDisplayName%2A>属性来提供更具描述性的.NET Framework 版本字符串，适用于显示到客户端的程序集。

trans-unit.source: The following example applies the `TargetFrameworkAttribute` to an assembly and assigns both property values to indicate that the assembly was built using [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例应用`TargetFrameworkAttribute`的程序集并将分配指示程序集生成使用这两个属性值[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The version of the .NET Framework against which the assembly was built.
trans-unit.target: 生成该程序集时针对的 .NET Framework 的版本。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.TargetFrameworkAttribute" /> class by specifying the .NET Framework version against which an assembly was built.
trans-unit.target: 通过指定一个程序集在生成时针对的 .NET Framework 版本，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.TargetFrameworkAttribute" /> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: The string that is assigned to the `frameworkName` parameter generally takes the same form as the string that is returned by the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.FrameworkName.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 分配给字符串`frameworkName`参数通常采用返回的字符串的形式相同<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.FrameworkName.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the display name of the .NET Framework version against which an assembly was built.
trans-unit.target: 获取生成某个程序集时针对的 .NET Framework 版本的显示名称。

trans-unit.source: The display name of the .NET Framework version.
The <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.TargetFrameworkAttribute.FrameworkDisplayName%2A> property usually returns a relatively long descriptive string that is suitable for display to a user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.TargetFrameworkAttribute.FrameworkDisplayName%2A>属性通常返回适用于向用户显示相对较长的描述性字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the .NET Framework version against which a particular assembly was compiled.
trans-unit.target: 获取编译某个特定程序集时针对的 .NET Framework 版本的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the .NET Framework version with which the assembly was compiled.
trans-unit.target: 编译该程序集时针对的 .NET Framework 版本的名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.TargetFrameworkAttribute.FrameworkName%2A> property maps to the `frameworkName` parameter of the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.TargetFrameworkAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.TargetFrameworkAttribute.FrameworkName%2A>属性将映射到`frameworkName`参数<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.TargetFrameworkAttribute.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: It represents the .NET Framework version in a compact form and typically corresponds to the string that is returned by the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.FrameworkName.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 它表示简洁形式的.NET Framework 版本和通常对应于返回的字符串<xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.FrameworkName.ToString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。
